title: Visual Sorting
subtitle: algorithm learning tool
desc: Modular and scalable design. Utilizes centralized state management through Redux, and takes advantage of aynchronous actions using Redux-Thunk. Includes bubble sort, quick sort, and merge sort.
shortDesc: Modular and scalable design. Includes bubble sort, quick sort, and merge sort.

title: To Do List
subtitle: personal organization tool
desc: Fully functional note taking app with folders and persistent data through browser cache. Takes advantage of a number of Javascript ES6 features as well as custom CSS elements.
shortDesc: Fully functional note taking app with folders and persistent data through browser cache.

title: Old Portfolio
subtitle: web projects portfolio
desc: My first attempt at a web portfolio. Developed from scratch using SASS and vanilla JS. Includes animations, custom scrolling behaviour, and more.
shortDesc: This is what my portfolio used to look like! Check it out!
